game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the dungeon
game.description: An ancient artifact has been lost in the shadowy depths of the old dungeon. Brave its dangers and retrieve the artifact for the town's historian.
game.reward: 500 gold coins, artifact knowledge, and a magic sword

task.objective: Locate the entrance of the dungeon
task.description: The old dungeon is located in the forest to the East of town. Find its entrance.
The dungeon is infested with various monsters. Battle them to reach the artifact.
The artifact is said to be placed on an altar deep within the dungeon. Retrieve it safely.
